Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of that card this turn. If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
Equinox {4}{U}{U} [i](If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
